cast.overview: The true story of pilot Barry Seal, who transported contraband for the CIA and the Medellin cartel in the 1980s.
cast.title: American Made

details.biography:
Tony Guerrero is a Mexican actor, model and  voice over artist. He is based in Atlanta, Georgia.

Tony Guerrero has appeared in several television broadcast tv shows, numerous Hollywood films Starring Actors such as Tom Cruise, Kevin Bacon, Rebel Wilson, and many more, he is the official voice in Spanish for Prestigious Companies such as: Coors lite, Lucky Charms, T-Mobile, American Airlines among others, he has also produced short and long format Films and has appeared in many TV commercials Nationwide.
details.name: Tony Guerrero
